subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Mike Maccagnan praised Coach Todd Bowles and said long-term success was the ultimate goal for the Jets, who at 5-4 are on the periphery of the A.F.C. wild-card chase.
snippet: Mike Maccagnan praised Coach Todd Bowles and said long-term success was the ultimate goal for the Jets, who at 5-4 are on the periphery of the A.F.C. wild-card chase.
